title: Making Art Heals Hearts
description:
Chelsea Phaire is an artist, philanthropist, and all around do-gooder. At just 10-years-old, Chelsea did something pretty extraordinary. And not only did it make a difference in her life, it helped thousands of other kids, too.

Learn more about Chelsea’s Charity and see how you can get involved — chelseascharity.com 

Follow Chelsea’s Charity on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
